attributes.additional_details:
As we know the BBC will not scrap the TV LICENSE totally but what I want is a reduction of £50 where everybody benefits as a pay per view will prove costly in the long run to collect.
Lets allow the BBC to have adverts every hour on the hour for products other than there own shows and spinoffs as they do now.
So come on government force the BBC to give something back to all the people that have funded the BBC all these years.
MAKE THEM DROP THE FEE TO £100
